content: Wood fine finish circular saw blade (CPC) Ultimate circular saw blade for fine finish in wood, offering more run time for cordless saws ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features 40 high-density carbide teeth – engineered for fine, clean cuts in wood while keeping vibration to a minimum Ultra-thin kerf – minimizes energy consumption so you can cut up to 40% more per battery charge Low-friction coating – helps to keep blades at their most effective temperature, making them last much longer and prevent wood scorching Designed to cut straight – the finishing blade for when you need a smooth, clean and precise result Applications Rip- and cross-cutting for fine woodworking Finish carpentry with lumber, construction timber, solid wood (hard and soft) Cutting wooden boards (plywood, formwork, OSB, chip) cleanly Cutting trim and skirting ### TECHNICAL DATA:Blade features: Special for cordless, Carbide tipped, Fine finish, Ultra thin kerf technology, Long lifeBlade diameter: 7-1/4 inNumber of teeth: 40 Technical Data | Blade features | Special for cordless, Carbide tipped, Fine finish, Ultra thin kerf technology, Long life | Blade diameter | 7-1/4 in | Number of teeth | 40 | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2191164 - Circ. saw blade SPX FI 7 1/4 T40 - Package Size 5 pc - 3595393 - Master Carton - Circ. saw blade SPX FI 7 1/4 T40 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 15x Circ. saw blade SPX FI 7 1/4 T40
